Section.title: Overview
Section.Paragraph: The SMF/B format is a binary encoding for the SMF model.
An SMF/B file begins with a simple fixed-size header followed by a series of sections containing data and metadata.

All data in an SMF/B file is written in big-endian byte order, with the exception of triangle and vertex data which may be electively written in big-endian or little-endian byte order based on the order specified in the SMF section.
